meanings.definition: A unit of weight equal to 1,000 kilograms.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested tonnes of potatoes this season.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally ordered tonnes of cat food online!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him weighed tonnes on her heart.
meanings.sent5: The elephant weighed as much as several tonnes.

meanings.sent1: There were tonnes of people at the concert.
meanings.sent2: She had tonnes of fun at the party.
meanings.sent3: I have tonnes of homework to do tonight.
meanings.sent4: The news hit her like tonnes of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The bakery produced tonnes of bread daily.
